title: Improvising
description:
Ron Hart, Jiji Lee and Greg Fitzsimmons share stories about writing porn, a Korean mom and tough customer, and a massage with a not so happy ending.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ron Hart, Zack and Miri, Cream, Jiji Lee, Lindsey Buckingman, Julia Jacklin, Greg Fitzsimmons, Jeff Barr, Rodrigo y Gabriela, Kevin Allison)
